thread.title: Kim Jong Un and China's Xi met in secret, again

title: Kim Jong Un and China's Xi met in secret, again
text:
Kim Jong Un and China's Xi met in secret, again 8:51pm IST - 01:16
China's state-run media revealed on Tuesday that North Korean leader Kim Jong Un made an unannounced visit to Chinese President Xi Jinping the day prior, what appears to be the second trip to that country that Kim has made in the last two months.
China's state-run media revealed on Tuesday that North Korean leader Kim Jong Un made an unannounced visit to Chinese President Xi Jinping the day prior, what appears to be the second trip to that country that Kim has made in the last two months. //reut.rs/2KFY2S5
